title: Senior Vendor Manager EU Fashion Shoes & Handbags
description: do you want to work one of the fasen growing and most innovativ businesses at amazon are you interested working a high impact role come join our new european fashion team and influence the evolution of e commerce the fashion world amazon is looking for exceptionally talented senior manager with relentless focus on building up the earth s greatest fashion consumer shopping experience featuring relevant products from relevant brands unique selection innovativ service more compelling content than any store online or off the role is based amazon s european headquarters for fashion shoes munich reporting to the head of vendor management eu fashion shoes the official title for this role is senior vendor manager your responsibilities to develop lead and execute the vendor management strategy for the assigned brands across europe you build strong relationships at a senior level with our top vendors and drive profitable growth you be responsible together with local vendor managers to create and implement a european selection strategy with local relevance you share best practice with your team members you turn depth analysis into strategicen insight and action you seek out ways to automate simplify manual processes order to improve productivity you work closely with the local vendor managers and eu stock and product management teams for your assigned brands the performance of your product category customer experience and operational efficiency determine your success professional experience at a senior level ideally e commerce retail key account management or consulting environment experience building senior level internal and external relationships proven ability to influence others a business setting strong communication skills and assertive approach whilst maintaining your ability to be vocally self critical experience of managing and developing a high performance team passionate self starter decisive and able to move with speed to implement ideas a business focused way of thinking and a strong hands on results driven mentality excellent english skills proficient eith french or german university degree required ideally a technical or analytical discipline cross functional experience especially finance marketing or supply chain excellent knowledge of excel and databas work with experience sql as a plus mba from leading business school beneficial commercial experience of the fashion industry are you interested we look forward to receiving your application please submit your online application including your cv and covering letter one document stating your earliest start dat and salary expectations by submitting your resume and application information you authorize amazon com to transmit and store your information the amazon com group of companies world wide recruitment databas and to circulate that information as necessary for the purpose of evaluating your qualifications for this or other job vacancies

title: Senior Business Manager - Amazon Video Transactional (m/w)
description: job descriptionare you a strategicen thinker with high ambitions come make a difference a high growth innovativ global and fun company that combines startup atmosphere with a well established brand help create the future of digital entertainment with amazon we are looking for exceptional people with outstanding analytical skills people who are entrepreneurial highly motivated and who have what it takes to make amazon video the place for people to come to for their entertainment needs we are seeking a senior business manager who be responsible for growing amazon s transactional video business vod est together with major studios this role you have a high degree of decision making and full account responsibility you work closely with content providers to maximize the performance of titles plan and negotiate for marketing support and secure differentiating content furthermore you develop and analyze financial metrics and provide senior management with insights and recommendations from the daily business key we strive to be foremost scholars with respect to our industry and its products you leverage your creativity and your ability to think big to build and shape a new industry your decisions and actions determine amazon s product offering competitive standing market segment status as well as elements of long term customer trust and value selection you be working with the content acquisition team on this core component of amazon s brand and value proposition for our customers we strive to be market segment leaders selection not just terms of title count but relation to timeliness of availability content features and the curatorial resonance appeal of title selection our marketing promotional efforts pricing you be responsible for the primary driver of value and trust for customers securing optimal customer value relative to our profitability needs costs you drive continuous improvement on content costs by providing superior incentive of value for vendors to do you ll leverage promotional opportunities marketing programs and improved partnership amenities such as reporting and self service tools to drive growth of the overall business notwendig qualifikationen ba or equivalent first hand negotiation experience extensive years experience of vendor management or key account management excellent analytical skills excellent communication and organizational skills ability to adapt to a quickly changing fasen moving environment ability to build strong working relationship with vendors and internal teams alike wünschenswerte qualifikationen mba phd strategy consulting or business development experience p l responsibility knowledge of the digital video landscape including solid understanding of digital video distribution fluency english german

title: Strategic Business Development Manager (m/f) - Digital Goods and Online Services
description: job description about amazon amazon com opened on the world wide web july the company is guided by four principles customer obsession rather than competitor focus passion for invention commitment to operational excellence and long term thinking customer reviews click shopping personalized recommendations prime fulfillment by amazon aws kindle direct publishing kindle fire tablets fire tv alexa and echo devices are some of the products and services pioneered by amazon about amazon paymentsover the past years amazon has earned the trust of over million active customers by providing unprecedented convenience selection and value on amazon com now this same purchase experience can be made available anywhere you shop merchants who enable pay with amazon make it easy for millions of the web s most valuable consumers to safely purchase from them just a few clicks or taps using the information already stored their amazon account this helps merchants quickly turn visitors into high value customers low acquisition costs improve conversion rates and rapidly boost sales revenue pay with amazon is now offered countries north america europe and asia and continues to grow role descriptionamazon external payment services eps is the means by which amazon extends its relationship with customers beyond its sites eps exports the convenience trust and preference for amazon across the web apps and other connected devices our goal is to become the method that every customer chooses to pay a merchant worldwide amazon is bringing together its unrivaled customer data world class personalization technologies and unique positioning within the ecommerce value chain to enable other retailers and partners to create unique commerce and purchase experiences that benefit buyers and merchants globally with a relentless obsession for our customers both merchants and buyers we are growing rapidly and offer a unique opportunity to join a small high visibility organization that has the potential to contribute to a sizeable part of amazon s overall growth the strategicen business development manager build ecosystem of partners the digital and startup space helping to create better commerce solutions that integrate amazon services and facilitating the adoption of amazon payments by merchants and consumers example of counterparties include payment processors and gateways commerce platform and solution providers mobile iot consumer electronics providers the strategicen business development manager particularly focus on one of a kind relationships and agreements or first of a kind that may serve as a template for other similar relationships success be defined as a function of the acceleration of key business metrics such as incremental addressable market value acceleration of processed payment volumes and satisfaction of clients merchants consumers developers with our services the strategicen business development manager help to shape the title: Senior Program Manager Product Releases Display-Ads (f/m)
description: amazon media group operates at the intersection of ecommerce and advertising offering a rich array of digital display advertising solutions with the goal of helping our customers find and discover anything they want to buy we help advertisers reach amazon customers on amazon com across our other owned and operated sites on other high quality sites across the web and on millions of kindles tablets and mobile devices we start with the customer and work backwards everything we do including advertising if you re interested joining a rapidly growing team working to build a unique world class advertising group with a relentless focus on the customer you ve come to the right place the international business operations team is looking for a strong and accomplished senior program manager m f who be part of a growing team dedicated improving operational excellence customer satisfaction and internal processes the team is operating across europe india and japan the following areas process workflow improvement business analysis customer satisfaction program platform improvements product releases training billingthe senior program manager m f own the product release program and ensure his her team s programs are kept on track this is opportunity to develop a robust set of programs to ensure that our clients receive a first class customer experience as our business continues to scale the senior program manager m f work closely with key partners within the customer success team along as other sales platform product and marketing to improve our tools and processes this role be a good fit if you are a self starter that thrive a complex environment where leaders are hands on are highly analytical and detail oriented are passionate about owing solutions and solving issues with minimal supervision or direction are able to communicate complex issues a clear and concise way are able to consistently create consensus solutions on challenging topics are excellent at iterating quickly to design pilot run and continually evolve processes and related automationfinally if you are obsessed with being a part of digital advertising that informs instead of interrupts that helps customers deliver great products and brands not just delivers impressions and that empowers customers to be decisive rather than distracts them then we want you to come join us and make advertising even better fluent english experience building processes project management and release schedules relevant management experience several years of relevant work experience program management technically oriented strong business judgment analytical and project management experience communicating with technical and non technical stakeholders at all levels across multiple business units experience online advertising bachelor s degree computer science engineering or a related technical discipline experience with agile or other program management methodologies german french spanish or italian is a plus sql knowledgesounds interesting we look forward to your application please apply online and upload your cv and a letter of motivation one document max mb by submitting your resume and application information you authorize amazon to transmit and store your information the amazon group of companies world wide recruitment databas and to circulate that information as necessary for the purpose of evaluating your qualifications for this or other job vacancies

assignments a regional team s target region from germany and other countries to europe americas or asia pacific africa middle east particular o advise employer companies on the available forms of international assignments incl planning effects for company and employee and costs estimate o prepare contracts and calculate compensation taking into account labor immigration social insurance and tax requirements as well as compliance ruleso provide operational support during assignment e g payroll pay review bonus etc o organize repatriation work closely with the hr departments of the home and host companies external service providers and the relevant authorities support the team leader with conceptual tasks such as the development and maintenance of country profiles as well as process definition and optimization your profile university degree business administration specializing hr and organization or similar qualification years work experience international assignments ideally at thyssenkrupp itself another dax company or another major international company or relocation provider extensive knowledge of the relevant statutory provisions of one or more of the countries relevant to thyssenkrupp labor immigration tax social insurance laws fluent german and english a third language would be advantage international experience e g working and living abroad or international projects strong service focus team skills confident manner open and communicative personality structured methodical and analytical approach to work high standards regarding quality of own work independence initiative flexibility and strong commitment very good knowledge of ms office word excel powerpoint outlook as well as specific it tool for expatriates management kpmg link our offer to you at thyssenkrupp we give you the freedom to expand your horizons with flexible work time models international teams and attractive working conditions and social benefits collegial collaboration and mutual respect are something we have been practicing for more than years if they are just as important to you as they are to us then apply now we look forward to receiving your application together with your salary expectations which you can submit online using our we value diversity and therefore welcome all applications regardless of gender nationality ethnic or social origins religion worldview disability age sexual orientation or identity thyssenkrupp agrecruiting serviceoperations service center tel

title: Project Manager Customer Implementation (m/f) Division Issuing
description: your profile about wirecard working at wirecard what we offer become a part of wirecard would you like to work for international fintech company and play active role shaping the future of payment that case we look forward to you joining our team as we are constantly on the lookout for dedicated talented people who share our vision as a software and it service provider listed on the tecdax of the deutsch börse wirecard ag based aschheim near munich is one of the globally leading independent providers of outsourcing and white label solutions for payment innovations wirecard technologies gmbh combines the technology of our products and solutions wirecard technologies gmbh s team members develop and promote our software of the future to meet the needs of paying customers worldwide to fulfill our product lines and to develop the it infrastructure to strengthen our team aschheim munich we are seeking to recruit a n project manager customer implementation m f division issuing your duties planning tracking and coordinating dedicated customer projects from pre sales until launch involving a wide range of different parties and systems both at wirecard and on the customer side first point of contact for the customer including occasional on site customer support coordinate and manage technical commercial legal and organizational project work packages coordinate and execute customer specific configuration payment scheme and infrastructure setup as well as testing activities and configuration within all wirecard systems throughout all staging domains set up operational processes risk and fraud prevention and monitoring and reporting of above areas escalation management change request management including financial evaluation preparation of and participation customer presentations and steering boards your profile university degree or equivalent education or several years of work experience several years of experience project management customer projects with very good knowledge the launch of new technical consumer products experience the financial services industry is desired particularly experience working with visa and mastercard is a plus experience project planning and tracking both agile and classical waterfall methodologies ability to work successfully a team hands on attitude and strong moderating skills able to find creative compromises quick understanding of complex processes and analytical skills excellent communication skills english good german skills constitute advantage with years of experience on the market wirecard ag offers more than customers state of the art technology transparent real time reporting services and support developing their international payment strategies offline online or mobile the wirecard group has been supporting companies accepting electronic payments from all sales channels a global multi channel platform bundles international payment acceptances and methods flanked by fraud prevention solutions when it comes to issuing their own payment instruments the form of cards or mobile payment solutions wirecard provides companies with end to end infrastructure including the requisite issuing licences for card and account products as a software and it specialist wirecard is constantly expanding its portfolio with innovativ payment technologies we offer our customers all products and services for secure and smooth electronic payment transactions it is a very exciting business area other words we operate international market which is extremely dynamic we work using the latest technology and are shaping the future for example mobile payment and we are growing quickly that is why we are always looking for new people who are on the same page as us and willing to work together towards success our fundamental philosophy is to always be open and fair with those around us we are open to those we work with regardless of where they are from and how they hope to develop we encourage employees to tread new paths with us every single day to achieve this unusual ideas are always welcome at wirecard when are you joining us what we offer challenging and diverse tasks with scope for introducing your own ideas and experience excellent working atmosphere a highly motivated and successful team with international company culture further professional and personal development at one of the world s leading providers of payment processing attractive salary as well as long term prospects and a chance for promotion a successful company that is growing strongly a modern workplace with additional company benefits such as a canteen fitness area incentives and staff events become part of our success story become part of a highly qualified team united by a vision to make payment happen wirecard technologies gmbh mr andreas dürbeck einsteinring aschheim tel

title: Manager, BUY Project Management (m/f)
description: opuscapita helps organizations sell buy and pay more effectively by providing them with extended purchase to pay and order to cash solutions with million transactions processed annually by over customers across more than countries we have created a global ecosystem where buyers suppliers banks and other parties connect transact and grow together with our customers opuscapita is transforming sales procurement and financial processes for the digital age opuscapita s net sales were eur million and employed professionals founded opuscapita is headquartered helsinki finland to learn more please visit are you passionate about project management and leadership how about a new career with highly skilled global team at opuscapita we are now looking to hire manager buy project management at opuscapita our vision is to transform purchase to pay and cash management for the digital age with our cloud based software we process million electronic transactions annually for customers we have the expertise to make buying and paying easier and more cost effective we want to hire more top notch professionals to join our team location can be any of our major locations e g germany sweden finland about the job we are looking for experienced passionate candidates who enjoy working teams and are eager to invest their own professional development your key responsibilities include leading a team of project managers responsible for managing buy solutions customer implementation projects responsible for organizing resourcing and prioritizing own teams responsible for developing team competencies based on product and technology roadmaps responsible for meeting business growth both volume and geographical coverage responsible for customer satisfaction of project deliveries change requests and support together with relevant colleagues participate and contribute buy solutions implementation process standardization and continuous improvement your application we ll be browsing experience from line manager role sound project management domain knowledge sound purchase to pay process knowledge excellent leadership skills strategy communication influencing collaboration planning organizing competence development leading the team continuous improvement and standardization orientation able to create improvement plans to current processes and delivery models strong change management skills to lead international technical teams through business environment change and growth strong customer focus capable to secure that customer requirements be fulfilled projects project steering skills project steering group member or sponsor role strong co operation skills with internal colleagues and stakeholders pre sales experience capable to create facilitate rfx responses can do attitude and capability to make things happen fluent business english and german skills what is opuscapita like as a workplace we offer you a truly global work arena a substantial and agile company with colleagues we want to transform purchase to pay and cash management for the digital age with our cloud based software and are building a company that embodies our vision you have your own responsibilities but accountability for the results of the entire team and you can expect help from your colleagues working for us you get to develop your skills but it is possible to acquire new skills through job rotation we are contact with our international colleagues on a daily basis and english is our official language we want you to enjoy your work and do our best to create the optimal atmosphere for ideas to flourish our i love mondays club welcome you to leisure activities to enjoy some relaxed time with your co workers questions mind for additional information please contact jussi mikkonen at to apply please send your application and cv via our system online by at the latest note that we may start conducting interviews right away and make hiring decisions as soon as the suitable candidate is found

title: Head of Contracts / Procurement / Estates and Deputy to Head of Corporate Services Germany (m/f)
description: head of corporate services hcs and all the teams based at the british embassy berlin consulate general dusseldorf and munich as well as corporate services hubs vilnius lisbon and colleagues the united kingdom main duties and responsibilities providing advice and leading on all aspects of contracts procurement and estates for berlin and for the whole of germany network by following best practice and maintaining auditable guidelines contract management daily management and responsibility for all embassy contracts including estates privat finance inititiative pfi like a public privat partnership telecommunication insurance security residential property leases office machinery and vehicle leases check and initiate tenders where necessary working closely with the hub relevant team members and managing the relationship with the stakeholders to liaise manage and control the financial aspects of the pfi contract attending quarterly liaison meetings and working closely with colleagues brussels and the uk housing and estate management setting up and preparing housing committee meetings with estates manager daily oversight of all aspects of the estate including maintenance and health and safety issues finding new accommodation based on the guidelines set out by london and as per the housing committee s decisions manage lease contract of some of the properties with the german authorities revision of existing leases contracts management of rent payments and termination of contracts procurement management of prism procurement system at post and liaison with the hub vilnius and the global transaction processing centre gtpcen the uk property lawyers and contractual parties to ensure gaining maximum value for money and that the procedures set by centre hub for consolidated posts for procurement are followed and implemented correctly at post and germany wide manage and approve government procurement card gpcen transactions budget management working closely with budget and finance manager and hcs accurate management of a budget of approx million following best practice and adhering to audit requirements preparing or feeding into various financial and procurement returns and meeting all necessary deadlines facilities management liaise with on site fm providers to make sure high customer service levels are met and contract terms are filled ensure full compliance with corporate procedures including local and uk health and safety regulations and policies line management managing the estates and procurement team directly line manage staff members and leading overall team of this includes performance management supporting staff members l d and helping the team delivering their business plans deputising role deputise for and support hcs all aspects of cs work including representing the team relevant meetings when she is absent and making sure all deadlines are kept help to implement any change programmes logistics manager crisis committee contributing to the wider objectives of the british government s germany network and supporting its positiv working environment ad hoc duties carry out other duties that may reasonably be required and which are accordance with the grading and core competencies of the job essential qualifications and experience fluent english and german both written and spoken minimum of c2 level for cefr framework and excellent communication skills budget management experience line management experience knowledge of german contracts and procurement processes excellent time management and prioritisation skills with the ability to work under pressure strong interpersonal skills proven ability to form professional relationships and build trust with a wide range of contacts strong negotiation skills excellent it skills including ms outlook word and excel and a good understanding of telecommunications systems desirable qualifications and experience degree masters or equivalent qualification business or relevant subject knowledge of contract law advantage knowledge of the german housing market experience of a pfi contract experience of using oracle based systems including prism pyramid required competencies seeing the big picture making effective decisions leading and communicating collaborating and partnering delivering value for money managing a quality service application deadline july grade c4 l type of position full time flexible working fixed term with possibility of renewal working hours per week region europe eastern europe central asia country territory germany location city berlin type of post british embassy number of vacancies starting yearly salary eur gross per annum rising to approx gross per annum after a qualifying period addition to performance related pay salary is not negotiable start dat november other benefits and conditions of employment this is a full time position of five working days hours net excluding unpaid breaks per week for initial contract period of two years which may be extended by mutual agreement the jobholder become part of the british government s presence germany which aims to support and foster them and their work the british embassy berlin has a strong ethos of learning and development including our learning and development week addition there be many opportunities to attend external seminars and events on relevant issues this is addition to the induction programme offered to all embassy staff the successful applicant be encouraged to be actively involved the corporate life of the embassy contributing to the wider objectives of the british government s germany network and supporting the embassy s positiv working environment additional information the successful candidate be subject to professional background check and security clearance all applicants should have the right to live and work germany the successful candidate must have pre existing work authorization for germany order to apply the british embassy does not sponsor for work permits staff recruited locally by the british embassy germany are subject to terms and conditions of service according to local german employment law for your information interviews are likely to be held between august september please note common european framework of reference for languages learning teaching assessment indicates level c2 as mastery or proficiency level which comprehends that a person can understand with ease virtually everything heard or read can summarize information from different spoken and written sources reconstructing arguments and accounts a coherent presentation can express themselves spontaneously very fluently and precisely differentiating finer shades of meaning even the most complex situations for more information please click on the following link please bear mind case you are invited for interview your languages skills are going to be assessed please note that the deadline for applications is on the day mentioned the above field application deadline we advise you to allow enough time to complete and submit your full application since only applications completed and submitted before the deadline be considered please be aware that the deadline for submitting applications is considered to be the time zone for the country where the vacancy has arisen please be advised that the british embassy not be able to meet the travel costs incurred when travelling to the interview nor the costs connected with relocation if offered a job
